title: Burning with Desire
description: Lust... Passion... Pure Desire...These firefighters risk their lives battling flames every day to protect their town from tragedy, but they're looking for love. In between horrifying fires and working wicked crazy hours, the men in uniform are searching to find their special someone. They all have quirks and flaws, but the ladies only see heroes.
